subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Arata Fujiwara, who does not belong to a running club, coaches himself and trains for speed instead of endurance, is Japan’s best medal hope in the men’s marathon in 20 years.
snippet: Arata Fujiwara, who does not belong to a running club, coaches himself and trains for speed instead of endurance, is Japan’s best medal hope in the men’s marathon in 20 years.
